rooms.description: A combined entrance hall and living area placed along the northern wall to adhere to Vastu principles for positive energy flow. Features a reception desk.
Adjacent to the living area on the eastern side. A space for dining and family gatherings.
Located in the southern portion of the ground floor to maintain privacy while ensuring ample light and ventilation.
Adjacent to the dining area with a view on the eastern side. Designed as per Vastu guidelines for culinary spaces.
Integrated into the ground floor for convenience, aligned with northern aspects to promote good energy.

openings.description: Positioned centrally on the front facade to welcome positive energy as per Vastu.
Located along the northern and eastern walls for maximum natural light. Reinforces Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached ensuite bathroom. Positioned along the southern wall for privacy and optimal use of space.
A comfortable bedroom for the remaining family members, ensuring ample space and privacy.
Common bathroom for the upper floor. Positioned towards the north to maintain balance as per Vastu.
A dedicated study area for work or study. Placed on the western side to leverage quiet surroundings and proper lighting.

openings.description: Secure staircase connecting the ground floor to the first floor. Designed with safety and aesthetics in mind.
Adjacent to master bedroom for ventilation and view of the surrounding area.

rooms.description: A spacious open terrace providing a communal space for family relaxation and gatherings. Equipped with seating areas, planters, and shaded zones following Vastu's spatial harmony.

openings.description: Provides access from the first floor to the rooftop terrace.
To enhance natural illumination on the terrace.
